listitem.para: [renodr] - Fix issues with GPU accelration in Falkon causing crashes on some systems. Fixes #21444.
[renodr] - Update the build configuration for MuPDF to use the system-installed copy of freeglut. Fixes #21506.
[renodr] - Update to firefox and spidermonkey 128.10.0esr (Security Update). Fixes #21509.
[renodr] - Update the gstreamer stack to 1.26.1 (Security Update). Fixes #21498.
[xry111] - Update python dependencies to attrs-25.3.0, markdown-3.8, setuptools_scm-8.3.0, and trove-classifiers-2025.4.11.15. Addresses #18562.
[renodr] - Update to gnome-shell and gnome-shell-extensions 48.1. Fixes #21437.
[renodr] - Update to evolution-data-server and evolution 3.56.1. Fixes #21424.
[renodr] - Update to intel-media-driver-25.1.4 and intel-gmmlib-22.7.1. Fixes #21456.
[renodr] - Disable python plugin support in libpeas because it is incompatible with pygobject-3.52.x, and it causes applications which utilize it to hang indefinitely.
[renodr] - Fix building libportal against Qt 6.9. Fixes #21429.
[bdubbs] - Remove packaging (Python module). Moved to LFS. Addresses #21477.

[bdubbs] - Update to lxqt-2.2.0. Several packages have different version numbers: libdbusmenu-lxqt-0.3.0, libqtxdg-4.2.0, qtxdg-tools-4.2.0, xdg-desktop-portal-lxqt-1.2.0, lxqt-archiver-1.2.0, qps-2.11.0, and screengrab-2.10.0. Fixes #21469, #21470, #21471, #21472, #21473, #21474, and #21475.
[zeckma] - Update to alsa-lib, alsa-ucm-conf, alsa-utils, and alsa-tools 1.2.14. Fixes #21453.
[bdubbs] - Update to openssh-10.0p1 and ssh-askpass-10.0p1. Fixes #21411.
[renodr] - Fix building libcdio on i686 systems.
[renodr] - Fix building Qt6 on i686 systems.
[bdubbs] - Add a patch to glslang-15.2.0 to ensure libSPIRV.so is installed. Fixes #21387.
[bdubbs] - Update to qt6-6.9.0 and qtwebengine-6.9.0. Fixes #21378.
[pierre] - Add build-1.2.2.post1 (Python module) and its dependency pyproject_hooks-1.2.0. Part of #21194.
[bdubbs] - Update to qt6-6.8.3 and qtwebengine-6.8.3. Fixes #21341.
[renodr] - Fix building gnome-bluetooth with pygobject-3.52.0 and later. Thank you to Xi for the patch and to Wayne Blaszczyk for the initial report.
[renodr] - Update to evolution and evolution-data-server 3.56.0. Fixes #21250.
[thomas] - Update to vte-0.80.0. Added a page for new dependency to 'fast_float'. Fixes #21265.
[renodr] - Update to SPIRV-Headers and SPIRV-Tools 1.4.309.0. Fixes #21236.
[renodr] - Update to Vulkan-Headers and Vulkan-Loader 1.4.309. Fixes #21242.
[renodr] - Add an entry to AppStream for LFS 12.3.
[renodr] - Fix a runtime issue in glib2 caused by the new version of gobject-introspection.
[renodr] - Update the gstreamer stack to 1.26.0. Fixes #21231.

[zeckma] - Combine all libgedit packages into Gedit, and update to libgedit-gtksourceview-299.5.0, libgedit-amtk-5.9.1, libgedit-tepl-6.13.0, and libgedit-gfls-0.3.0. Fixes #21205, #21206, #21208, and #21209.
[renodr] - Update to Firefox-128.8.0esr and Spidermonkey (Security Update). Fixes #21182.
